wikipedia_page.main: Patricia Monaghan is  Regius Professor of Zoology in the Institute of biodiversity, animal health & comparative medicine at the University of Glasgow.

response: * 2013 - now Pat MonaghanThe University of Glasgow Story Zoology (Regius Chair); on the website of the University of Glasgow, read 21. January 2015.Pat Monaghan takes up Regius Chair of Zoology, University News, University of Glasgow; read 8. July 2015.
|2004||Pat Monaghan ||Bad beginnings and untimely ends: Life history trade-offs in birds
David Houston demonstrated Sex Allocation in lesser black-backed gulls in a practical study with Pat Monaghan in 1999.

link_mentions.page: Association for the Study of Animal Behaviour
response: Pat Monaghan, Regius Professor of Zoology at the University of Glasgow, is President of the ASAB Council as of October 2017."About ASAB", Association for the Study of Animal Behaviour.
